official_title: Joint resolution asking the President of the United States to declare the fourth Saturday of each September National Hunting and Fishing Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to declare the fourth Saturday of each September "National Hunting and Fishing Day".

titles.title: Joint resolution asking the President of the United States to declare the fourth Saturday of each September National Hunting and Fishing Day.
